amendment.description: Manager's amendment clarifies the grant award language and adds authorizing provisions intended to promote student retention.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 113-444 to make technical corrections and improvements to the underlying bill text.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kline amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Kline.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kline amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
